amendment.description: To appropriate funds for bilateral economic assistance.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 3520 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 53 - 45. Record Vote Number: 148.
Motion to table amendment SA 3520 made in Senate.
Amendment SA 3520 proposed by Senator Biden. (consideration: CR S7377-7379, S7382, S7384; text: CR S7377; text as modified: CR S7378) To appropriate funds for bilateral economic assistance.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 3520 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 53 - 45. Record Vote Number: 148.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3520 proposed by Senator Biden.
